3 cups all-purpose flour,½ teaspoon baking powder,1 teaspoon baking soda,1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,1 pinch ground nutmeg,1 pinch ground ginger,1 pinch ground black pepper,2 cups white sugar,1 cup vegetable oil,3 eggs, beaten,2 teaspoons vanilla extract,2 cups shredded zucchini,½ cup dates, pitted and chopped,,
